title: News Scraper - Global News Aggregator
description: Scrapes news articles from major international news websites including all sections (World, Politics, Business, etc.) and returns data in NewsAPI-compatible format

sites.title: Target Websites
sites.description: List of news websites to scrape. Leave empty to scrape all supported sites.

maxArticlesPerSite.title: Max Articles Per Section
maxArticlesPerSite.description: Maximum number of articles to extract from EACH section (Homepage, World, Politics, Business, etc.). CNN has 11 sections. Set to a high value (9999) to capture all articles without limit.

timeout.title: Page Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for each page to load (in milliseconds)

outputFormat.title: Output Format
outputFormat.description: Choose the output format for the scraped data

includeImages.title: Include Images
includeImages.description: Whether to extract image URLs from articles

removeDuplicates.title: Remove Duplicates
removeDuplicates.description: Remove duplicate articles based on URL

proxyGroups.title: Proxy Groups
proxyGroups.description: Apify proxy groups to use (leave empty for auto)
